comments: This contract is a call-up against a Public Works and Government Services Canada procurement tool.     Commissionaire Services for the Public Service Pay Centre in Miramichi (Mall site) for the year 2013-2014.  Original contract reported at Q1 2013-2014. Amendment 1 issued in Q2 in the amount of $4,942.48 to add an additional 254 hours to watch over file shipment boxes delivered at the Pay Centre. Amendment 2 ($6,367.92) and Amendment 3 ($3,752.48) issued at Q3 to increase hours to supervise the Pay File shipments to the Pay Centre.
